name: niche-food
description: Smart scans for healthier pets - A PWA for analyzing pet food quality

scripts.build:web: rm -rf www && mkdir -p www && cp -r index.html styles.css script.js scoring.js storage.js i18n.js sw.js manifest.json favicon.ico *.png www/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.android:sync: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:build: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
